CustomField.formula: If(CMPL123TMS__Training_Status__c == 'Completed','Completed',If(NOT(ISBLANK(CMPL123TMS__Due_Date__c)) && (CMPL123TMS__Training_Status__c == 'Assigned'|| CMPL123TMS__Training_Status__c == 'In Progress'), If(CMPL123TMS__Due_Date__c < TODAY(),'Past Due','Pending'),''))
CustomField.label: Status
